title: Extreme Team Makeovers
description:
Mina and Arif Hasan of The Athletic discuss what success would look like this year for all of the teams that just hired a new head coach. Plus, Mina reveals her favorite song lyric of all-time.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
